LanguageData.VV_CedarWood.label: cedar wood
LanguageData.VV_CedarWood.description: Fragrant, lightweight wood from the cedar tree. Naturally resistant to decay and insects, it is favored for storage chests, roofing, and construction requiring durability without excess weight.
LanguageData.VV_EbonyWood.label: ebony wood
LanguageData.VV_EbonyWood.description: Dense and dark wood from the ebony tree. Extremely durable and sought after for high-end furniture, construction and tools. Though heavier and harder to work with, its beauty and strength are unmatched.
LanguageData.VV_MahoganyWood.label: mahogany wood
LanguageData.VV_MahoganyWood.description: Richly colored and smooth wood from the mahogany tree. Though lighter than ebony, it is highly valued for its balance between beauty, strength, and workability, making it ideal for furniture and decorative construction.
LanguageData.VV_RosewoodWood.label: rosewood wood
LanguageData.VV_RosewoodWood.description: Elegant and richly colored wood from the rosewood tree. Renowned for its deep red to purple hue, it is highly sought after for crafting high-end furniture and decorative items.
